Home.title: Know Your Interest
Home.description: Review your SPayLater payment plan before you checkout.

step1.title: Step 1: Locate SPayLater Option on Shopee on Mobile App
step1.description: Go to checkout page, you can see the total payment which is the product price that you have selected. In SPayLater section, Shopee has set your SPayLater limit based on your account activity. Need help? See the image/video:

step2.title: Step 2: Input Payment Details
step2.description: Carefully copy or type the total payment, all the monthly installment amount. Ensure the information is accurate to get the correct calculation results.

step3.title: Step 3: Calculate and Review
step3.description: Once you've entered all the required information, click the ‘Submit’ button. The calculator will display a detailed breakdown of your payment plan, including the total interest charged. Review the information to make an informed decision before proceeding with SPayLater.
